title: CircleUp
brief: Social networking platform for community engagement and connections.
description: CircleUp is a community-driven social networking application designed to foster connections, share updates, and organize events within local communities.
challenges: Building a scalable backend to support real-time interactions.
Designing a user-friendly interface for seamless social engagement.
Implementing secure authentication and authorization.
Handling complex state management and data synchronization.
features: User registration and authentication.
Posting, liking, and commenting on updates.
Event creation and management within communities.
Real-time notifications and updates.
Responsive design for mobile and desktop.

title: Recipe Book
brief: Full-stack recipe sharing platform with rich user interaction and analytics.
description: Recipe Book is a scalable full-stack web application allowing users to share, search, and manage recipes with authentication, image uploads, and an analytics dashboard to monitor user engagement.
challenges: Implementing secure user authentication and authorization.
Building an efficient image upload and storage system with previews.
Designing a responsive and intuitive dashboard with live analytics.
Optimizing search and filtering for fast performance on large datasets.
features: User registration, login, and profile management.
Recipe submission with rich text and image uploads.
Advanced search and filtering by category, cuisine, and ingredients.
Dashboard with real-time analytics and user engagement stats.
Mobile responsive design with intuitive navigation.

title: Personal Portfolio
brief: A sleek personal portfolio website showcasing projects, skills, and contact info.
description: This portfolio website is built with React and Tailwind CSS to showcase my skills, projects, and professional background. It features smooth animations, responsive design, and easy navigation to provide visitors with a clear overview of my work and contact details.
challenges: Implementing responsive design that works across all devices.
Adding smooth animations and transitions for enhanced UX using Framer Motion.
Organizing content in a clean and engaging way.
Optimizing performance and SEO with React Helmet.
features: Showcases projects with detailed descriptions and links.
Responsive design with mobile-first approach.
Smooth entrance animations with Framer Motion.
Contact form integration for easy communication.
Dark/light theme toggle and social media links.

title: BillEase
brief: Expense tracker app with Firebase auth and smart bill management.
description: BillEase helps users effortlessly track and manage their expenses with a clean interface, smart categorization, and secure Firebase authentication.
challenges: Implementing secure and fast user authentication with Firebase.
Designing an intuitive UI that simplifies bill tracking.
Managing state and data syncing in real-time with Firebase.
Creating insightful dashboard charts and statistics.
features: Firebase authentication for secure user login and registration.
Add, edit, delete, and categorize expenses.
Dashboard displaying expense trends and stats with charts.
Responsive design with smooth animations.

title: English Shikho
brief: Interactive English learning platform with text-to-speech and quizzes.
description: English Shikho is a beginner-friendly platform designed to help learners improve English language skills through interactive lessons, quizzes, and dynamic text-to-speech features.
challenges: Integrating reliable text-to-speech functionality across browsers.
Creating a clean UI that caters to learners of varying ages.
Managing dynamic content rendering for lessons and quizzes.
Ensuring smooth performance on low-end devices.
features: Interactive lessons with embedded text-to-voice support.
Progress tracking through quizzes and interactive exercises.
Simple, distraction-free UI optimized for mobile and desktop.
Content easily expandable for future lessons.
